GlobalValueSet.description: All status options for a Donor except Lead: Donor<Registered> Are in the system as a potential donor Q: Do we need in between states Pending Qualification Donor<Verified> Has filled out all Profile Info, Social Pic, and has verified email and SMS Donor<Scheduled> Has an appointment to assess their fitness for donation Donor<Eligible> Has met all criteria for donation and eligibility datetime is today or in the past. Donor<Ineligible> Has met all criteria for donation, but has become ineligible for numerous medical reasons e.g. has the flu, pregnant, etc. thus Eligibility datetime in the future. Donor<Excluded> Can never donate blood; eligibility date -> 9999 Donor<Lead> (not a part of this object def but is a Lead RT)
